name: Don't worry, Rainbows!
description:
In "Don't Worry, Rainbow!", you control God, and God actually take care of two rainbows! Your mission will be to take care of the rainbows like it was your child with sun and water!

You can move with arrows keys or left joystick on a controller and give sun with S (Y on controller) or water with W (A on controller). You can give sun and water to one rainbow every 10 second. There is two cubes on top of the rainbows for indicate their status. If cube is less color than white, go take care to the rainbow under it! the yellow cube is for sun, and the blue for water. For giving something to a rainbow, approach him and clik on the button of your choice for giving him water or sun. If a rainbow doesn't have sun or water anymore, the game is finished!

That game was made in 3 hours and some minutes with Godot Engine 3.3.2 for the Trijam 126 by Glitenshi!

Give your score in comment!

WARNING: It's better to play the finished version (released later than the Trijam Edition) because the first edition can contains bugs and not finished things (like title screen). But if you want to  play Trijam Edition, please comment if you have any bug,  thank you!

And for the respect of the themes:

Rainbow: You take care of rainbows

Equality: You need to equally take care of the two rainbows, or it's the game over!
